nodes.text: Varram was a male Secretary to the President of Balmorra Tai Cordan in the aftermath of the Battle of Balmorra during the Galactic War. Though Cordan trusted him, a former Balmorran resistance member Zenith viewed Varram as paranoid for creating a funding a personal militia to guard Cordan. Zenith evntually asked for Varram's support in the parliamentary election for the new Balmorran government, which was granted to him.
Secretary Varram is mentioned in Star Wars: The Old Republic during Zenith's companion storyline.
